title: Chaise Longue, "Bubbles", ca. 1988
creditline: Museum purchase from the Members' Acquisitions Fund of Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum
description: Base consisting of a continuous, ribbon-like curved mass of layered corrogated cardboard topped by a separate horizontal corrogated cardboard sheet acting as a cushion.
